welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Piqua, a charming city known for its rich history and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and discover all that this beautiful place has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dayton-Wright Brothers Airport offers a comfortable and convenient travel experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at James Cox Dayton International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is a small terminal at James Cox Dayton International Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is the newest terminal at James Cox Dayton International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Neil Armstrong Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Neil Armstrong Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
